m_UpdatePassword.sql: UPDATE TW_MIS_PMPA.TWBAS_PASS SET PASSWORD = :newPassword WHERE IDNUMBER = :sabun AND PASSWORD = :oldPassword

m_LoginCheck.sql: SELECT IDNUMBER, NAME FROM TW_MIS_PMPA.TWBAS_PASS WHERE IDNUMBER = :sabun AND PASSWORD = :password

m_GetName.sql: SELECT NAME FROM TW_MIS_PMPA.TWBAS_PASS WHERE IDNUMBER = :sabun
